import{useSpring,animated}from'react-spring';import{React}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import leaf from'../../images/leaf.png';import brush from'../../images/brush.png';import circle from'../../images/circle.png';import SectionOne from'./sectionOne';import SectionTwo from'./sectionTwo';import SectionThree from'./sectionThree';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var TecnologyBanner=function TecnologyBanner(props){var location=props.location.aboutProps;var _window=window,width=_window.innerWidth;var container=useSpring({to:[{height:location?width<=768?"250px":'400px':width<=768?"250px":"400px"}],from:{height:location?width<=768?"250px":'400px':width<=768?"250px":"550px"}});// Leaf animation --------------
var leafimg=useSpring({to:[{left:'0%',top:width<=768?location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'37px':'37px':'37px':location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'97px':'97px':'97px'}],from:{left:location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'50%':'0%':'33%',top:width<=768?location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'-37px':'37px':'37px':location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'-97px':'97px':'97px'},config:{duration:500}});// Gear animation --------------
var gearimg=useSpring({to:[{top:'-48px',left:location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'50%':'50%':'50%'}],from:{top:'97px',left:location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'0%':'100%':'50%'},config:{duration:500}});// brush animation --------------
var brushimg=useSpring({to:[{right:location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'0%':'0%':'0%',top:width<=768?location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'37px':'37px':'37px':location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'97px':'97px':'97px'}],from:{right:location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'0%':'50%':'30%',top:width<=768?location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'37px':'-48px':'37px':location?location.name==='fromEnvironment'?'97px':'-110px':'97px'},config:{duration:500}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(animated.div,{className:"technology-banner",style:container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Technology"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{className:"technology-img1",style:leafimg,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:{pathname:'/Environment',aboutProps:{name:'fromTechnology'}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:leaf,alt:"img"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{className:"technology-img2",style:gearimg,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:{pathname:'/homeBanner',aboutProps:{name:'fromTechnology'}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"gear-img",src:circle,alt:"img"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(animated.div,{className:"technology-img3",style:brushimg,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:{pathname:'/skill',aboutProps:{name:'fromTechnology'}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:brush,alt:"img"})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SectionOne,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SectionTwo,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SectionThree,{})]});};export default TecnologyBanner;
